Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Ğd-ḥr, a priest, with a black painted lappet-wig, a modelled face with a black painted beard(damaged) and crossed arms in relief holding a black painted adze and the string of the seed-bag that hangs over the shoulder; the front of the leg section is inscribed with black painted Hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar(worn) and a plinth beneath the foot(much missing).
Condition: incomplete - much of foot missing, glaze worn from back-pillar
